Try removing it via Software Center and adding ppa:mozillateam/firefox-stable
With Software Center, Edit>Software Sources>Other Software
Then remove the rogue Firefox one and use theadmin's command in the terminal
I assumed you were using Oneiric. Open Synaptic.
In one of the menus, there'll be an Other Software option or something like that.
On the pannel, you should see an edit menu when your mouse is over it.
This is how my screen looks, http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/213/softwarecenter.png/
Move your mouse to the panel or hit the Alt key
That's how you get the Menus
